title: Booker T (wrestler)
summary: Booker T. Huffman Jr.[lower-alpha 1] (born March 1, 1965)[1] better known by his ring name Booker T, is an American professional wrestler, professional wrestling promoter and color commentator. He is signed to WWE, and is also the owner and founder of the independent promotion Reality of Wrestling (ROW) in Texas City, Texas. Booker has been named by peers and industry commentators as one of the best professional wrestlers of his era; he was voted WWE's greatest World Heavyweight Champion in a 2013 viewer poll.
